page.title: 08HOUSING FAULKNER STREET
page.content: {FAULKNER STREET IS A VERY VARIED STREET,FOR INSTANCE THERE IS A COLLECTION OF DIFFERENT DESIGNS AND PATTERNS ON THE BUILDINGS.THERE ARE A VARIETY OF INTERESTING HOUSES, INCLUDING A PUB WHICH IS DESIGNED AS A VICTORIAN HOUSES.THE CHIMNEYS ON THE HOUSES HAVE MANY SHAPES,SIZES AND PATTERNS. OVER THE WINDOWS THERE ARE DRIPSTONES WHICH STOP THE RAINDROPS FALLING ALL OVER THE WINDOWS.ABOVE THE DOORS OF THE HOUSES THERE IS A RECTANGLE SHEET OF GLASS WITH A PATTERN ON.THE ROAD IS NARROW AND WELL WORN DOWN FROM THE MANY VEHICLES DRIVING UP AND DOWN.THE PAVEMENTS ARE VERY LOW DOWN TO THE ROAD AND WIDE ENOUGH FOR THREE PEOPLE TO WALK ALONG IT AT THE SAME TIME.THE OLD GAS LAMPOSTS IN FAULKNER STREET WORKED BY GAS BUT NOW THEY USE ELECTRICITY BUT THE SAME OLD STYLE
